title: Revising the effectiveness of municipal waste management in Hong Kong - Frontiers
summary: This research aimed to evaluate the effectiveness of three proposed approaches, investigate whether the environmental awareness of citizens will affect the effectiveness of current waste management strategies, and examine the differences in the level of environmental awareness of residents in different geographical constituencies. The study confirmed that the environmental awareness of Hong Kong citizens varies among various geographical constituencies. MSW charging tends to be effective and should be implemented in Hong Kong.

title: CS Tuiya invites Danish waste recyclers to invest in Kenya - The Star Kenya
summary: Cabinet Secretary for Environment Soipan Tuiya invited Danish waste recycling companies to invest in Kenya's emerging circular economy. She assured them of government support and said that the country has established a robust regulatory framework to anchor the sector. Kenya hosted its inaugural Loop Forum in February 2023 with the support of the Danish and Dutch governments, bringing together over one thousand participants from across the world to showcase circular economy technologies, products and innovations.
green_innovation: TRUE, the article describes a sustainable innovation that contributes to environmental sustainability goals, such as reducing resource consumption by developing a circular economy.
business_innovation: TRUE, the article describes a new or improved product or business process (or combination thereof) that differs significantly from the firm's previous products or business processes and that has been introduced on the market or brought into use by the firm.
green_product: TRUE, the article describes a good or service that is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, the article describes a method or technique in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.

title: Top 10 Best Waste Management Companies In USA 2023 - Inventiva
summary: Waste management companies in the USA are effectively implementing advanced waste management strategies, such as landfill disposal, recycling, and waste-to-energy conversion, to reduce the environmental impact of waste. The industry is characterized by significant players like Waste Management Inc., Republic Services, and Waste Connections, which dominate the market through their extensive service networks and technological innovations. These companies face ongoing challenges, including the need to adapt to changing waste streams, rising public awareness about environmental issues, and evolving waste management regulations.
